*div1 type="summary"* *p*B. J. Thompson to Austin, July 22, 1826. Turbulence at Nacogdoches. Asks Austin to indorse his request for permission to organize a volunteer company for protection against Indians*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"* *p**location_mentioned*State of Chuahuila and Texas*/location_mentioned**/p* *p**location_mentioned*District of Nacogdoches*/location_mentioned* *date_mentioned n="07-22-1826">22 July 1826*/date_mentioned**/p* *p*DrSiR*/p*
*p*In my Communication to you of *date_mentioned n="02-xx-1826">Febuary Last*/date_mentioned* as Respects obtaining a *location_mentioned*grant */location_mentioned*for Land in your *location_mentioned*coloney */location_mentioned*I Received a verbal Answer by my *person_mentioned*father */person_mentioned*that you had Disposed of all your Land That you was orthised to Let out at that Time—under those considerations I contracted for a claim of Land in this*location_mentioned* section of country*/location_mentioned*—but sir heave not abandoned the Idia of obtaining a *location_mentioned*grant */location_mentioned*of Land in your *location_mentioned*Coloney*/location_mentioned* when you are orthised to Let the same—*/p*
*p*I could be verry well satisf yed to stay in *location_mentioned*this section of the country*/location_mentioned* If I could Do it in Peace But we are in a verry confused situation, no Harmoney Existing, in society owing to the malesetious and Restless Disposition of one individual who is *person_mentioned*James gains*/person_mentioned*—But sir I will not Enter into a Detail of our grevances but will Refare you to *person_mentioned*Judge Williams*/person_mentioned* The Berier a worthy *person_mentioned*sitizen */person_mentioned*of this *location_mentioned*Nabourhd */location_mentioned*for Infermation—When the*person_mentioned* People of this *location_mentioned*section of country */location_mentioned**/person_mentioned*lernd that your *location_mentioned*colony */location_mentioned*was Like to be Ingaiged in a war with the *person_mentioned*savages */person_mentioned*on our *location_mentioned*fruntears */location_mentioned*I was seelisited to Raise or attempt to Raise a *person_mentioned*company of volanteers*/person_mentioned* to assist your or Do and perform all services Required in Defence of our *location_mentioned*country*/location_mentioned*—I applied to the sd *person_mentioned*James gains*/person_mentioned* and the *person_mentioned*alcalde of *location_mentioned*Nacogdoches*/location_mentioned**/person_mentioned* who assumed the commend of the *person_mentioned*Malitia */person_mentioned*of this *location_mentioned*Districk */location_mentioned*for Permeetion to Raise a *person_mentioned*company */person_mentioned*of that kind which was granted*/p*
*p*on the *date_mentioned n="07-12-1826">12 of this Instant*/date_mentioned* I Drew and article (which you will see in my communication Through you to the government—marked No (1) my first attempt and my success, and on the *date_mentioned n="07-21-1826">21st*/date_mentioned* I receved the order from the *person_mentioned*alcalde */person_mentioned*that you will find marked in said communication No (2) forbiding me to Proseed any further I concluded to stay any further Proseeding untill I could ask the Permission of government for order to organise a *person_mentioned*company */person_mentioned*of that kind or Directions to Desist and abandon the Idea of any further Persuit on the subject I have taken the liberty to make my communication through you to the *person_mentioned*governor of these States*/person_mentioned*, If you can feel a willingness to assist us I know It is in your Power and your friendship would be greatfully Remembered by the good *person_mentioned*People of this *location_mentioned*District */location_mentioned**/person_mentioned*I hope sir from our long acquaintance you could not harbor any Idia of any unfriendly motives I had in my attempt to Raise sd *person_mentioned*Company */person_mentioned*I do assirt to you upon the honer of a man that It was from the Purest motives and only to Raise the *person_mentioned*company */person_mentioned*for the Purpose as mentioned in my communication and to Establish Peace and Hormioney in the *location_mentioned*country*/location_mentioned*—If you concer in the steps I heave taken I hope sir you will Lend me your assistance in sending on my Patisction to government in a maner that you think will be Recived making any alteration you may Deem nessary not to alter the Intent or meaning there off—I should be much Pleased to heave your oppinion on the subject and what Ever you advise I will cheerfully submit to I could Raise a Hundred stout hardy Resolute men men to assist you If nessary well armd and acquipt all we want is the sanction of government which I hope we will obtain*/p*
*p*My *person_mentioned*Father */person_mentioned*and *person_mentioned*Brother */person_mentioned*wishes to be Remembered to you—Pleas*/p*
*p*to Remember me to your *person_mentioned*Brother*/person_mentioned*, and Accept for your self the Best wishes*/p* *p*Your verrey Humble servent*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*B, J, Thompson*/person_mentioned**/p* *p**person_mentioned*Col. S, F, Austin*/person_mentioned* */p* */div1*
